The '''Kama Clan''' are the only known survivors of the tragedy of [[Tsurumi Island]]. They are descended from [["Kama"]], the only survivor of the Tsurumi Island disaster.

==Clan Traditions==
The clan is said to have a rich oral tradition, which is how they have recorded history for millennia.
